description: Designed after ginkgo leaves, these pistols are lightweighted and easy to handle, capable of firing bullets strong enough to break steel.
ranks: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by 10, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
